title: Say Yes to Swinging - Go from HELL NO to OH YES by Choosing Cons
description:
Say Yes to Swinging: Go from HELL NO to OH YES by Choosing Consensual Non-Monogamy (Swinger's Starter Guides Book 1)


Is consensual non-monogamy right for your relationship? 

Committed and loving couples everywhere are rejecting life-long monogamy by choosing to swing. They see the disconnect between imposed monogamous ideals and the reality of human sexuality. They boldly dismiss our cultureâ€™s sexual repression by taking control of their own sex lives. They choose consensual non-monogamy, an alternative lifestyle that is more fun, accessible, mainstream and fulfilling than you have ever imagined. Thatâ€™s why Say Yes To Swinging: Go from HELL NO to OH YES by Choosing Consensual Non-Monogamy is here to guide you through those first crucial steps so you can have the sex you want without losing the amazing partner you already have. 

Learn the information you and your partner need to make an informed choice about entering the swinger lifestyle. Get tips on having that first difficult talk with your spouse or partner and how to move beyond jealousy and resentment. Educate yourself about the opportunities and expectations of the community, all while growing comfortable with a more open sexuality together. Once you get to know the average swinger, youâ€™ll think they seem just like you. 

Read this rolicking guide to find out more about these exciting topics:
